clusters.name: Echo Cluster – 30 Layer Strategy
clusters.description: Preserves the original 7-stylo detection logic, AI traps, and authentic imperfection rules. Format compatible with Echo ingestion system.
clusters.logic: (sentence_variation >= 99.5 and vocabulary_entropy >= 98 and eb <= 0.70) or (sentence_variation == 100 and vocabulary_entropy >= 97.5) or (sentence_variation >= 99 and vocabulary_entropy >= 96 and eb <= 0.71 and structure_consistency >= 80 and structure_consistency <= 85) or ((sentence_variation >= 95) + (vocabulary_entropy >= 95) + (structure_consistency >= 95) + (vocab_diversity >= 0.95) >= 3) or (sentence_variation >= 95 and vocabulary_entropy >= 90 and eb <= 0.75 and pgfi <= 6 and structure_consistency >= 75 and structure_consistency <= 90) or (eb > 0.90) or (structure_consistency > 95) or (vocab_diversity > 0.90) or (vocabulary_entropy < 30) or (punctuation_rhythm < 8) or (sent_len_dist > 7.5) or (eb > 0.88 and structure_consistency > 95) or (vocab_diversity > 0.88 and vocabulary_entropy < 35) or (structure_consistency > 96 and vocabulary_entropy < 40) or (structure_consistency <= 75 or (vocabulary_entropy <= 85 and sentence_variation <= 90)) or (eb <= 0.82 and structure_consistency <= 92 and vocab_diversity <= 0.85 and sentence_variation <= 95 and vocabulary_entropy >= 35 and vocabulary_entropy <= 95) or ((sentence_variation >= 90 and structure_consistency <= 80) or (structure_consistency >= 88 and sentence_variation <= 70) or (eb >= 0.75 and structure_consistency >= 85 and vocabulary_entropy <= 80)) or (punctuation_rhythm >= 15 and mc >= 50 and pgfi <= 10 and sentence_variation >= 25) or (sentence_variation >= 95 or vocabulary_entropy >= 98 or eb <= 0.70 or structure_consistency <= 80 or punctuation_rhythm >= 40 or (pgfi <= 5.0 and eb <= 0.80)) or (eb >= 0.87 and structure_consistency >= 92 and vocab_diversity >= 0.87) or (structure_consistency >= 95 or vocab_diversity >= 0.92 or eb >= 0.92) or (sentence_variation >= 85 and vocabulary_entropy >= 85 and eb >= 0.75 and eb <= 0.85 and structure_consistency >= 85 and pgfi >= 4 and pgfi <= 8) or (pgfi <= 15.0 or sentence_variation >= 20 or vocabulary_entropy >= 30 or structure_consistency <= 95 or punctuation_rhythm >= 5 or mc >= 30 or info_density <= 0.50 or eb <= 0.85 or vocab_diversity <= 0.90)
